特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
1. This course will be mainly conducted in English and English will be the means of communication between the students and the instructor. (Students will also be expected to communicate with one another in English.)
2. Students are encouraged to actively participate in class discussions, both independently and collaboratively, in order to enhance their competence and confidence in English and also to create a better learning environment for all.
